segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, which looks quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman near the sink, engaged in drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention seems completely absorbed by this simple task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing dramatically, with water pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a significant puddle on the floor and running down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in this growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how oblivious she is to the situation around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She shows absolutely no reaction, maintaining a neutral expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about her slipping on the wet floor, or the damage all that water will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is clearly on, and the drain is just not working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't looked down even once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is genuinely concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR
